Statute.Title: Budget and Economic Statement Implementation Act, 2007
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution du budget et de l’énoncé économique de 2007, Loi d’)

CoordinatingAmendment.Text: Coordinating amendments, 2007, c. 35, ss. 92 to 100 and 130 to 134

General.Text: General, 2007, c. 35, s. 144, as amended by 2013, c. 33, par. 196(1)(a) (International Cooperation)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2007, c. 35, in force on assent 14.12.2007, except

Item.Text: — ss. 141 and 142 (Part 7) in force 31.03.2009 see SI/2009-25
— s. 172 deemed to have come into force 01.04.2010 see s. 175 and Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 146, No. 2, p. 26
— s. 174 in force on assent but repealed see 2015, c. 4, s. 116.
See also various application provisions throughout

CIF.Text: CIF, 2013, c. 33, s. 196 in force on assent 26.06.2013
